name: Human Solvable Hashes [RELEASE STAGE]
description: Welcome to the Human Solvable Hashes! Feel like a hacker and decode peoples accounts. Leave a comment down below for something I can do to make the game better.  Also leave a comment if you wish for another difficulty increase expansion. It is currently in full release for Easy mode. Expansions will come for the game if you want them to be made and added
